tossup_question: -   –  What type of nebula is formed as a star ejects ionized gas after its evolution through the asymptotic giant branch phase?
bonus_question: -   –  What is the relationship between the ages of stellar populations and their scale heights above the galactic disk?
bonus_MCQoptions:
W) Younger stellar populations have a larger scale height
X) Scale height is independent of stellar population age
Y) The oldest and youngest stellar populations have a larger scale height than populations of intermediate age
Z) Younger stellar populations have a smaller scale height
bonus_answer: ANSWER: Z) YOUNGER STELLAR POPULATIONS HAVE A SMALLER SCALE HEIGHT
